name: 11.23 & 11.24 "Rebecca Gaines, Rebecca Loses" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who had his memory class graduation?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	He couldn't remember at all until Norm said he was thinking of signing up for a memory class. Then Woody forgot where his car was parked but quickly remembered and said, "see it's working".

questions.text: Why did Rebecca know so much about classical music?
questions.correct: Her mom was a concert cellist.
options: She studied classical music in college.
She used to play the violin.
Her dad was a concert cellist.
questions.explanation:
Her mom was a concert cellist.

	Frasier was surprised that Rebecca knew about classical music. Rebecca said that whenever she tried to sit on her mother's lap, she fell through.

His mom.

	He came into the bar and said "Dames is grief". He said that fighting was all they did anymore.

questions.text: Who asked Rebecca if she was free Saturday evening?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Gaines

	Mr. Gaines was Kelly Gaines-Boyd's father. Rebecca was invited because she had an interest in classical music.

questions.text: What age did Ma Clavin say the legal driving age should be?
questions.explanation:
50.

	She told Cliff he drove too fast. She said that if they raised the legal driving age to 50, there would be fewer accidents on the road.

Rebecca.

	She kept drinking wine from the glasses to make them even. This was a problem because Mr. Gaines now wanted her to be a guest.

questions.text: What did the guys think Cliff did to his mother?
questions.explanation:
Killed her.

	He said earlier his problem with his mom was over. Then he mentioned taking her into the woods. Then he had dirt under his nails. Cliff actually put her in a retirement home.

Rebecca.

	She was drunk and didn't know how to act. When the singer hit the high notes she started to sing with him.

questions.text: Did Cliff's mom fit in at the retirement home?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The owner said she was a big hit with the gentlemen. When Cliff got there she was dancing. She was also voted MVP for the softball game.

questions.text: Why did Cliff take him mom out of the retirement center?
questions.explanation:
It cost too much money.

	Her insurance didn't fully cover the cost of his mom living there. He carried his mother out over his shoulder.
